mapper.insert: insert into classify (id, name, parent_id, create_time, update_time, deleted, parent_ids) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update classify set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_ids = #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, parent_id, create_time, update_time, deleted, parent_ids from classify
